knimeNode.name: Peptide Fragmenter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Performs calculation of a theoretical spectrum from a digestion of the user-specified protein sequences.

fullDescription.intro:
Performs calculation of a theoretical spectrum from a digestion of the user-specified protein sequences.
This node uses the JavaProtLib from the Swiss Bioinformatics Institute to perform fragmentation of the protein sequences.

ports.inPort: Input table with amino acid sequences in a single column
ports.outPort: Results of enzymatic digestion and theoretical fragmentation (incl. MS/MS spectra)
